sentences.en: A mathematician or a wit would give you the wrong answer.
sentences.cn: 数学家或才子会给你错误的答案.

sentences.en: He was a good mathematician, far better than I, with first - rate technical ingenuity.
sentences.cn: 他是一名优秀的数学家, 比我要强得多, 在技术上有着头等的聪明才智.

sentences.en: I'm not a very good mathematician.
It was three years ago that a young mathematician solved the problem.
sentences.cn: 三年前,一位数学家解决了这个问题.

sentences.en: Lewis Carroll was both a mathematician and an author.
sentences.cn: 路易斯.卡罗尔既是数学家又是作家.

sentences.en: Make much mathematician, physicist, astronomer wait to be enrolled to enter Microsoft.
sentences.cn: 许多数学家 、 物理学家 、 天文学家等被招进微软.

sentences.en: Since 1990, British mathematician Andrew Colin has been evolving trading algorithms.
sentences.cn: 从1990年开始, 英国数学家安德鲁·科林就已经在开发一种交易算法.

sentences.en: The earliest work in differential equations was first disclosed in letters from one mathematician to another.
sentences.cn: 常微分方程最早的著作出现在数学家们彼此的通信中.

sentences.en: The man with his back to the camera is a mathematician.
sentences.cn: 背对着照相机的人是位数学家.

sentences.en: The mathematician , Yurchenko , was a stubby , phlegmatic , shrewd person.
sentences.cn: 数学教师 尤尔钦科 是个矮胖的, 冷漠而机灵的人.

sentences.en: The mathematician always works in his study with the door locked.
sentences.cn: 这数学家总是锁着门在书房工作.(这句是介词宾语的补足语.)

sentences.en: The mathematician analyzed his figures again.
sentences.cn: 这位数学家再次分析研究了他的这些数字.

sentences.en: The mathematician is an impractical person who can't even boil an egg.
sentences.cn: 那位数学家是个什么事都不会做的人,连煮蛋都不会.

sentences.en: The polynomial factors in the harmonic - oscillator wave functions are called Hermite polynomials after a French mathematician.
sentences.cn: 谐振子波函数的多项式因子随一法国数学家之名而叫做厄米多项式.

sentences.en: The risks can be so complex that banks hire mathematicians to assess them.
sentences.cn: 这类风险可以是如此复杂以至于银行雇佣数学家们去评估它们。

sentences.en: This untutored mathematician had an obsession with numbers.
sentences.cn: 这位非科班出身的数学家对数字特别痴迷。

words.tran_cn: 数学的，数学上的；精确的

trans.tran_en: someone who studies or teaches mathematics, or is a specialist in mathematics
